price: 18. Ha ka jeedin wajigaaga dadka isla weyni darteed6, hana ku marin dhulka is qaad qaad. Hubaal Alle ma jecla isla weyne walba oo faan badan.
arabic: وَلَا تُصَعِّرۡ خَدَّكَ لِلنَّاسِ وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٖ
footnotes: 6. Bal waxa la doonayo waa inaad qaddariso dadka oo ku soo qaabisho wejigaaga oo dhan adigoo muusoonaya muujinaya farxad, oo aad u dhageysato si baraarug leh adigoo aad u daneynaya waxa ay kuu sheegayaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā tuṣaʿʿir khaddaka lilnnāsi walā tamshi fī al-arḍi maraḥan inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu kulla mukh'tālin fakhūrin
